name: yeehawlloween
description:
walk around and interact with folks on halloween night, while dressed up as a cowboy! this is my first project; i just wanted to experiment with writing dialogue, making sprites, and using bitsy in general. game is a few minutes in length

use arrow keys to move + interact (swipe in the desired direction on mobile; music doesn't work on mobile as far as i'm aware)

if you can't figure out how to get between areas, just follow the paths and sidewalks. everything that is the same color as you can be interacted with :3

made with bitsy; music made by me
